channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Positron raises $230M Series B to take on Nvidia’s AI chips
item.description: The investment comes from backers including the Qatar Investment Authority as demand for chips beyond Nvidia soars and as Qatar aims to build out its ...

item.title: Outdoor Vitals Vantage Alpine Puffer Jacket Review: Perfect Spring Puffer
item.description: Outdoor Vitals' Vantage Alpine puffer jacket uses gold-embedded down to break up water molecules to keep you warm and dry.

item.title: Epstein-linked longevity guru Peter Attia leaves David Protein, and his own startup ‘won’t comment’
item.description: Attia co-founded longevity medical testing startup Biograph, which came out of stealth a year ago.

item.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Why I Love Watching Curling
item.description: Within the sports culture of more, bigger, and faster, the epically slow winter sport of curling is an entrancing watch.

item.title: Alpine Skier Ryan Cochran-Siegle’s Starter Pack: Winter Olympics 2026
item.description: From maple syrup packets to a latex pillow, these are his personal essentials that bring a taste of Vermont to Milan.

item.title: Why Are Some Women Training for Pregnancy Like It’s a Marathon?
item.description: A growing legion of “zero trimester” influencers are convincing followers that healthy pregnancies are a choice—and that raw milk, watching sunsets, a...

item.title: The 2026 Winter Olympics Opening and Closing Ceremonies: What You Need to Know
item.description: From Heated Rivalry stars to the event’s iconic venues, here’s what you should be looking out for at the Winter Olympics 2026 opening and closing cere...

item.title: The Minneapolis tech community holds strong during ‘tense and difficult time’
item.description: Founders and investors in the Minneapolis tech industry told TechCrunch they've put much of their work on hold to help out their community.

item.title: Intel will start making GPUs, a market dominated by Nvidia
item.description: Intel has been bulking up a team to focus on this effort and will develop its GPU strategy around customer needs.

item.title: India’s Varaha bags $20M to scale carbon removal from the Global South
item.description: Varaha's fresh funding is part of a $45 million Series B round led by WestBridge Capital.
